previous.excerpt: Console is a free weekly email digest of the best tools and beta releases for developers. We keep track of everything - dev tools, devops, cloud, and APIs - so you don't have to.

localize.description: Console是一个免费的每周电子邮件摘要，为开发者提供最好的工具和测试版本。我们跟踪一切--开发工具、devops、云和API--所以你不必跟踪。

next.excerpt: Signing bad contracts is the worst. TermScout uses NLP + human attorneys to analyze more than 600 data points in common SaaS agreements and rates them based on customer favorability. Less negotiating, less legal, less confusion. Stop signing bad contracts!
next.title: TermScout - Free reviews and ratings on top SaaS contracts

localize.description: 签坏合同是最糟糕的。TermScout利用NLP+人类律师分析常见SaaS协议中的600多个数据点，并根据客户好感度进行评分。减少谈判、减少法律、减少困惑。别再签烂合同了!
localize.tagline: 对顶级SaaS合同的免费审查和评级

localize.description: 籤壞合同是最糟糕的。TermScout利用NLP+人類律師分析常見SaaS協議中的600多個數據點，並根據客戶好感度進行評分。減少談判、減少法律、減少困惑。別再籤爛合同了!
localize.tagline: 對頂級SaaS合同的免費審查和評級
